sentences.en: As we age the lenses of the eyes thicken, and thus refract light dif-ferently.
sentences.cn: 随着我们年龄的增长，眼睛的晶状体变厚，因此对光线的折射也会发生变化。

sentences.en: As we age, the lenses of the eyes thicken, and thus refract light differently.
sentences.cn: 随着我们年龄的增长，眼睛的晶状体变厚，因此对光线的折射也会发生变化。

sentences.en: Explain why different colours refract by differing amounts in the prism.
sentences.cn: 解释为什么不同颜色以不同数量在棱镜内折射.

sentences.en: Objective To evaluate the clinical value of combined optometry of auto refract keratometer and phoroptor.
sentences.cn: 目的评价电脑自动验光与综合验光仪主动验光联合应用的临床价值.

sentences.en: Round Brilliant diamond has the highest ability to refract and light.
sentences.cn: 圆的钻石有最高的能力折射和反射光.

sentences.en: Super shining reflection particles can refract light, and make lips shining with excellent effect.
sentences.cn: 超亮反射微粒,全方位折射立体光芒, 炫亮色彩,无与伦比!

sentences.en: The dream is the mirror of mind, it can refract an everybody's heart road rain distance.
sentences.cn: 梦是心灵的镜子, 它能折射出每个人的心路雨程.

words.tran_cn: [光] 折射率；折射性；[物] 折射本领

trans.tran_en: if glass or water refracts light, the light changes direction when it passes through the glass or water
